title: Sing a Song of Six Pants

sources.title: Sing a Song of Six Pants
sources.description: Title: Sing a Song of Six Pants Summary: The stooges are tailors, and are heavily in debt to the Skin & Flint finance company. When the boys read about the big reward for a fugitive robber, they think it could be the answer to ... Directed by: Jules White Actors: Moe Howard, Larry Fine, Shemp Howard Production Company: Columbia Pictures Release Date: 30 October 1947 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The stooges are tailors, and are heavily in debt to the Skin & Flint finance company. When the boys read about the big reward for a fugitive robber, they think it could be the answer to their problems. The bank robber conveniently ducks into their shop and leaves a suit with a safe combination. After his girl friend fails to retrieve it, the robber returns with gang and a wild fight ensues. The boys miss out on the reward but wind up with the crook's bankroll and can pay their creditors.

sources.title: Sing a Song of Six Pants (1947)
sources.description: The three stooges pursue a notorious burglar in order to pay past due notes to the Skin & Flint company and save their tailor shop. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/sing-a-song-of-six-pants-1947/

sources.title: Sing A Song of Six Pants
sources.description: The Three Stooges (Moe, Larry, Shemp) are tailors and are heavily in debt. Could a big reward for the capture of a fugitive bank robber answer their financial prayers? You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Sing A Song Of Six Pants (1947) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: Sing A Song Of Six Pants is a 1947 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

metadata.Plot: The stooges are tailors, and are heavily in debt to the Skin & Flint finance company. When the boys read about the big reward for a fugitive robber, they think it could be the answer to their problems. The bank robber conveniently ducks into their shop and leaves a suit with a safe combination. After his girl friend fails to retrieve it, the robber returns with gang and a wild fight ensues. The boys miss out on the reward but wind up with the crook's bankroll and can pay their creditors.
